content.rendered:
Wednesday, December 4, 2024
Today is an “A” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Attention 8th grade Québec Travelers, please report to the Large Group Room during flex on Wednesday, 12/4 for a mandatory meeting. Your flex teachers know where you will be.
  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we will be meeting after school in the Large Group Room on Wednesday, December 4. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass.
  • There is a student council meeting in Mrs. Kerls room on Wednesday 12/4.
  • No Place for Hate will meet after school on Wednesday 12/4 in room 257.
  • The following 7th and 8th graders have an All-County Chorus rehearsal today after school: Haley H., Kylah S., Zoe G., Jamison L., Emilia M., Keegan H., Olivia A, and Alec S. Please meet Mrs. Jackson in the chorus room after school. We only have 4 rehearsals left.
  • There is a Voice Club meeting today after school for anyone who likes to sing. NYSSMA participants will be choosing their solos- very exciting! Come help them pick a “best fit” song for their voices.
  • To prepare for our competition in February, Math Club will be meeting every Wednesday after school in Room R232. All students grades 6-8 are welcome.
  • Order your Yearbook! All yearbook orders are pre-order only! Click this link to order: https://jostensyearbooks.com/?REF=A01005038 if you would like to receive one in June. The yearbooks are $15 and softcover! Sales are pre-order only!

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
